name: sonar-ui
description: A framework-agnostic components and styling library

/**

 * LICENSE file in the root directory of this source tree.

scripts.build: cd node_modules/typescript-dev-kit/ && node scripts/build && cd ../.. && cp -r src/styles/* ./dist && sed -i 's#module/scripts/react/index#sonar-ui/react#g' ./dist/types.d.ts && sed -i 's#module/scripts/vuejs/index#sonar-ui/vuejs#g' ./dist/types.d.ts && cp ./dist/types.d.ts ./dist/react.d.ts && cp ./dist/types.d.ts ./dist/vuejs.d.ts
scripts.postinstall: test -n "$POSTINSTALLED" || POSTINSTALLED=1 yarn add --peer @types/prop-types @types/react @types/react-dom prop-types react react-dom vue
